title: Add sparkly luxury styling while keeping the UI child-friendly

requirements.text: Add a consistent, app-wide “sparkly luxury” visual layer that makes the UI feel noticeably more wealthy/premium while remaining child-friendly (e.g., subtle sparkle/glitter highlights, starbursts, and warm gold shimmer accents) without reducing readability.

quotes: it still doesntt look like it is for a rich person where are the sparkles and stuff agaishh i wanna make it child friendly tho

acceptanceCriteria: Welcome, Login, Home, Games Hub, and Quiz screens visibly include sparkly/premium cues beyond just the cream/gold palette (e.g., sparkle overlay, starburst accents, shimmer highlights).
Sparkle effects do not obscure text/buttons and maintain high contrast and legibility.
Visual style remains playful/approachable (kid-friendly) rather than overly dark/serious.

requirements.text: Implement reusable “sparkle” styling utilities (CSS/Tailwind utilities and/or a small reusable React overlay component) and apply them to existing luxury surfaces (e.g., .luxury-gradient, .luxury-card, .luxury-surface) so sparkles appear consistently across the app instead of only on isolated icons.

quotes: where are the sparkles and stuff

acceptanceCriteria: There is a single, reusable approach to adding sparkles (utilities/component) that is used in multiple screens.
Sparkle layer can be applied to both full-screen backgrounds (e.g., Welcome/Login/Home) and to key cards/headers (e.g., ScreenHeader or major cards) without layout breakage.
Sparkle styling works in both light and dark mode.

requirements.text: Keep animations and effects child-friendly and accessible: respect reduced-motion preferences and ensure sparkle animations are subtle (no rapid flashing) and do not negatively impact performance on typical devices.

quotes: i wanna make it child friendly tho

acceptanceCriteria: When the user has reduced-motion enabled, sparkle animations are disabled or significantly reduced (static sparkle overlay is acceptable).
No fast flashing effects; sparkle animations are gentle and slow.
No noticeable jank during scrolling or interactions on the main screens after sparkles are added.

requirements.text: Add generated static sparkle/glitter visual assets and use them as overlays/background textures (served from frontend/public/assets/generated) to reinforce the rich-person aesthetic across key screens.

quotes: where are the sparkles and stuff

acceptanceCriteria: New generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend (not via backend).

At least one generated sparkle texture/overlay is visibly used on Welcome and Login screens; scene-based screens (Games Hub/Quiz) also get a subtle sparkle overlay above the scene background but below content.
Assets render crisply on common screen sizes without visible tiling seams (or use intentional seamless tiling textures).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components).
Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Use English for any user-facing text.
Backend logic and data models must remain unchanged for this styling-focused request.
nonGoals: Adding new gameplay features or changing quiz/game logic.
Adding new authentication methods beyond Internet Identity.
Creating real-time features or external service integrations.

required: Seamless soft gold sparkle/glitter texture with tiny star specks on transparent background (sparkle-overlay-seamless.dim_1024x1024.png)
Corner starburst/shine accent set (4 variations) on transparent background (sparkle-corners-set.dim_1024x1024.png)
Subtle bokeh + glitter gradient haze on transparent background (glitter-haze-overlay.dim_1920x1080.png)
